snippet: Iran was expected to dominate the annual security conference in Munich, instead the bloodshed in Syria and the failed U.N. resolution have. Russia's foreign minister stunned the conference by saying that Moscow was not on the side of President Bashar...
abstract: Iran was expected to dominate the annual security conference in Munich, instead the bloodshed in Syria and the failed U.N. resolution have. Russia's foreign minister stunned the conference by saying that Moscow was not on the side of President Bashar al-Assad.

headline.main: 'We Are not Friends or Allies of Assad.'
